trends: There has been one other sighting in Huron
There was one other sighting in Huron on or around November 30th 2004
divs: Sighting DetailsI check the newspaper in my hometown and I noticed the picture today about this elderly fellow that had built a model of something he saw... I noticed the orange lights and thought maybe his info could link to the incidents in northern Indiana last April. Folks in this area are quite friendly, and I think he would be willing to talk... If link doesn't show his picture then you'll have to check their archive or try to see thier e-edition... www.tmnews.com HURON -- Phillip King used some gutter screen, a few dozen reflectors, two satellite dishes, four mobile home foundation legs and some other bits and pieces to create a replica of what he says he saw flying over U.S. 50
